title: Whether the area affected by the notification under Works of Defense Act - 1903, is earmarked in Development Plan / Regional Plan or not, it shall be permissible to treat the area under such restrictive zone as marginal distance at the time of construction of any building proposed on contiguous unaffected area
clause_text: Whether the area affected by the notification under Works of Defense Act - 1903, is earmarked in Development Plan / Regional Plan or not, it shall be permissible to treat the area under such restrictive zone as marginal distance at the time of construction of any building proposed on contiguous unaffected area.
section: Restriction under the Works of Defence Act, 1903

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
